headline: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Pushes Back On Fears Surrounding Big Tech's $700 Billion CapEx Surge: 'Compute Equals Revenues' In The New AI World
summary: On Wednesday, Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang said he remains "confident" that Big Tech's massive AI infrastructure spending will continue. headline: Insiders Back Figma As AI Credit Push Meets Gemini Image Pressure

headline: Meta Broadens AI Chip Supply While Targeting Scam Advertisers Worldwide
summary: Meta Platforms (NasdaqGS:META) has signed multi billion dollar AI chip partnerships with AMD and Google, expanding and diversifying its AI infrastructure supply. headline: Cipher Digital Completes Pivot To Contracted AI And HPC Infrastructure
summary: Cipher Digital has completed its transformation from bitcoin miner Cipher Mining to a high performance computing data center developer. The company has exited non core mining assets and divested joint venture stakes and mining rigs. Cipher Digital has secured long term HPC capacity leases with AWS, Google, and Fluidstack and arranged substantial project financing. The company reports a multibillion dollar contracted revenue base supporting its repositioning as a digital infrastructure...

headline: Alphabet’s Clean Energy Bet Reshapes Data Center Power And Valuation Story
summary: Google, part of Alphabet (NasdaqGS:GOOGL), has signed long term power supply agreements in Texas and Minnesota to support new U.S. data centers. The company is working with AES and Xcel Energy to secure clean energy for these facilities. Google is also rolling out what it describes as the world’s largest iron air battery storage system using Form Energy’s technology, a first for a major cloud provider. For you as an investor, this move sits at the intersection of Alphabet’s core businesses...
